doc.title: Legal Entrapment
doc.plot: Ann, lawyer Barbara Damon's scheming secretary wants Barbara's boyfriend and will stop at nothing to get him! Using black magic and voodoo, Ann transports Barbara deep into a swamp where living vines drag Barbara kicking screaming into a quicksand bog! Will Ann's twisted plan work? Will Barbara survive? The only thing for sure is that two of them will die, one in the quicksand and the other drowned in her own bathtub!
